word: “And he said, Hear now my words: If there be a prophet among you, I the Lord will make myself known unto him in a vision, and will speak unto him in a dream. My servant Moses is not so, who is faithful in all mine house. With him will I speak mouth to mouth. . . . And the cloud departed from off the tabernacle; and, behold, Miriam became leprous, white as snow.”. . .
